My name is Kyle if another guy who happened to be named Kyle showed 
up would you ban him because the name is taken?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> Dewboy, your "oh so large" mouth consider what it says, BEFORE it 
> say anything. The council has to come to decisions (ie taking sides 
> in some case) about things, if we didn't the RPG wouldn't move, and 
> it would turn into an all out brawl.
> 
> To say that Hottie is correct would go against what we've been 
doing 
> since becoming council members. LN did have a char named Devil 
> Gigatron, so Hottie cannot have a character called that. Plain and 
> simple. (if LN were to let Hottie use the name, then it's different)
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: I know I should probably shut up about this, but Winged 
> Warrior 
> > told me about the whole Technorganic Australia thing and I can 
> only 
> > say HA HA HOPE YOU LOOSE THIS ONE TO.
